price: Na Yeye ndiye aliye kuenezeni katika ardhi, na kwake Yeye mtakusanywa.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ
footnotes: Na Yeye ndiye aliye kuumbeni duniani, na kwake Yeye peke yake ndio mtarejeshwa Siku ya Kiyama kwa ajili ya malipo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī dhara-akum fī al-arḍi wa-ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
